TextEng: I don't have many answers, but it seems like the Sword Coast Boys are out of action. Everything's calming down in this district.
Text: 답은 많이 없지만 검 해안의 패거리가 활동을 못 하는 것 같아요. 이 구역이 모두 진정되고 있어요.

TextEng: What are you doing? I don't want anyone drawing attention here! It ain't safe out there, not with Drawl and his Sword Coast Boys making like corpses.
Text: 뭐 하는 거예요? 여기 주목받고 싶지 않아요! 밖은 안전하지 않다고요. 드롤과 검 해안의 패거리들이 시체처럼 돌아다니잖아요.

TextEng: Your looks aren't much better than the zombies, but thanks just the same. Didn't want to end up like them.
Text: 당신 얼굴이 좀비보다 나을 것도 없지만 어쨌든 고마워요. 그들처럼 되고 싶진 않았어요.

TextEng: I ain't safe. They'll come back. Once a Sword Coast Boy, always a Sword Coast Boy... even if you're dead.
Text: 안전하지 않아요. 돌아올 거예요. 한번 검 해안의 패거리면 영원히 검 해안의 패거리에요... 죽어도.

TextEng: I wasn't having anything more to do with them, not after what happened to Drawl's rivals. Now they're all dead, and Drawl's some kind of monster!
Text: 드롤의 라이벌들한테 무슨 일이 일어났는지 알고 나선 더는 그들이랑 엮이지 않았어요. 이제 모두 죽었고 드롤은 괴물 같은 게 됐어요!

TextEng: I ain't going anywhere! I ain't ending up like them... not even Drawl, if I can help it.
Text: 아무 데도 안 가요! 그들처럼 되지 않을 거예요... 드롤도 막을 수 있다면 말이죠.

TextEng: I don't know. At first I thought The Heavies had something to do with it. They're a gang of half-orcs, but now they are all undead too.
Text: 모르겠어요. 처음엔 덩치들과 관련됐다고 생각했어요. 하프오크 갱단인데 이제 그들도 모두 언데드가 됐어요.

TextEng: They're all wandering around the warehouse. It's like Drawl put them on display, like with all his rivals... making a point.
Text: 모두 창고 주변을 배회하고 있어요. 드롤이 라이벌들처럼 전시해놓은 것 같아요... 본때를 보이려고.

TextEng: No way, Drawl and his lieutenants are worse. I saw 'em for a second... they ain't lumbering or slow... They look really evil now.
Text: 말도 안 돼요. 드롤과 그의 부하들이 더 나빠요. 잠깐 봤는데... 느릿느릿하거나 느리지 않아요... 이제 정말 사악해 보여요.

TextEng: He was the leader of our gang, but I don't know who he's dealing with now. I bet he gave over everyone just so he could be powerful.
Text: 우리 갱단의 리더였는데 이제 누구랑 거래하는지 모르겠어요. 강해지려고 모두를 넘긴 것 같아요.

TextEng: I wish it were just the plague. The Sword Coast Boys will do worse. These zombies were some of the gang I was in.
Text: 그냥 역병이었으면 좋겠어요. 검 해안의 패거리는 더 나쁜 짓을 할 거예요. 이 좀비들은 제가 있던 갱단이었어요.

TextEng: The Sword Coast Boys. These undead are... they WERE the gang I was in. I thought they would look out for me, you know?
Text: 검 해안의 패거리요. 이 언데드들은... 제가 있던 갱단이었어요. 날 지켜줄 줄 알았거든요.

TextEng: Thank you for your help... I didn't want to end up like them.
Text: 도와줘서 고마워요... 그들처럼 되고 싶진 않았어요.

TextEng: Thank the gods it's a friendly face. I sure didn't want to end up like those boys.
Text: 신께 감사해요. 친근한 얼굴이네요. 정말로 저 녀석들처럼 되고 싶지 않았어요.

TextEng: Some of the guys, they wanted to try and get the gang out of town while the plague was going on. You know, save their skins.
Text: 몇몇은 역병이 돌아가는 동안 갱단을 마을 밖으로 빼내려 했어요. 목숨을 구하려고요.

TextEng: Drawl was leader, and said everyone should stay. He said he had a deal that would make the gang really powerful. He wouldn't let anyone leave.
Text: 드롤이 리더였는데 모두 남아야 한다고 했어요. 갱단을 정말 강하게 만들 거래가 있다고요. 아무도 떠나지 못하게 했어요.

TextEng: Then he changed into... something. Now... everyone is dead... zombies, but different. And Drawl, he's still leading them. Don't know how... He's got a powerful friend somewhere.
Text: 그리고 나서 그가... 뭔가로 변했어요. 이제... 모두 죽었어요... 좀비지만 달라요. 드롤은 아직도 그들을 이끌고 있어요. 어떻게인지... 어딘가에 강력한 친구가 있나 봐요.

TextEng: I tell you, he's got someone backing him. I don't know. Maybe... maybe it's got something to do with the zombies everywhere, and they wanted undead that still had a mind.
Text: 말하지만 누군가 뒤에 있어요. 모르겠어요. 아마... 아마도 어디에나 있는 좀비들과 관련이 있고 아직 정신이 있는 언데드를 원했나 봐요.

TextEng: Not sure why they'd want Drawl, though. I guess he's real easy to please. I don't think he cares what happens to him, just as long as he's the strongest guy on the block.
Text: 왜 드롤을 원했는지는 모르겠어요. 만족시키기 쉬운 것 같긴 해요. 자기가 블록에서 가장 강하기만 하면 뭐가 되든 신경 안 쓸 거예요.

TextEng: I just hope he doesn't come looking for me. I wanna live a good long time.
Text: 그가 날 찾으러 오지 않길 바랄 뿐이에요. 오래 살고 싶거든요.

TextEng: The Sword Coast Boys? Drawl had them take over a warehouse as a new base. Don't know why he thought that specific building was so important.
Text: 검 해안의 패거리요? 드롤이 창고를 새 본거지로 점령했어요. 왜 그 특정 건물이 그렇게 중요하다고 생각했는지 모르겠어요.

TextEng: That was just a little while ago. It's in the north central area of the district.
Text: 얼마 안 됐어요. 구역 북쪽 중앙에 있어요.

TextEng: Me? I'm Krestal. I was just one of the Boys. I'm lucky that I'm not important enough to come after. Plague or no, I'd be over the wall if I was.
Text: 저요? 저는 크레스털이에요. 그냥 패거리 중 하나였어요. 쫓아올 만큼 중요하지 않아서 다행이에요. 역병이 있든 없든 중요했으면 벽 너머로 갔을 거예요.

TextEng: After what Drawl did to the others... and how they tracked Walters down after he left. I hope he's all right... I know Drawl's rivals ended bad.
Text: 드롤이 다른 사람들한테 한 짓... 그리고 월터스가 떠난 뒤 그를 추적한 것... 그가 무사하길 바라요... 드롤의 라이벌들이 나쁘게 끝난 걸 알아요.

TextEng: You guard fools can go risk your necks, but I'm not ending up like them... not me.
Text: 당신네 경비대 바보들이 목숨 걸어도 되지만 나는 그들처럼 안 될 거예요... 난 아니에요.
